trans-unit.source: Represents errors that occur during execution of [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] client applications.
trans-unit.target: Representerer feil som oppstår under utførelse av [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/add/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] klientprogrammer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"></xref> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"> </xref> klassen med en system-angitt melding som beskriver problemet.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>for den nye forekomsten til en system-angitt melding som beskriver problemet.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen tar hensyn til gjeldende system kultur.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.</xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`.| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Lokaliserte feil meldingen strengen. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"></xref> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt melding som beskriver problemet.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException>.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string specified in `message`.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`.| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil meldingen strengen som er angitt i `message`. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som beskriver unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren for denne konstruktøren kreves for å sikre at denne strengen er lokalisert for den gjeldende kulturen i systemet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"> </xref> klassen med en angitt feilmelding og en referanse til det interne unntaket er årsaken til dette unntaket.

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et unntak som er registrert som en direkte resultatet av et tidligere unntak må inkludere en referanse til det tidligere unntaket i den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>returnerer samme verdi som er sendt til konstruktøren, eller `null` hvis den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen leverer ikke internt unntak verdien til konstruktøren.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en forekomst av <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException>.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string specified in `message`.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>| `null`.| | <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>| Feil meldingen strengen som er angitt i `message`. |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som beskriver unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren for denne konstruktøren kreves for å sikre at denne strengen er lokalisert for den gjeldende kulturen i systemet.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket er årsaken til den gjeldende unntaket.

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `innerException` -parameteren er ikke <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, oppstår det gjeldende unntaket i en <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""> </xref> blokken som behandler det interne unntaket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The string value that contains the error message.
trans-unit.target: Strengverdien som inneholder feilmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: The integer value that contains status code.
trans-unit.target: Heltallsverdi som inneholder statuskoden.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The string value that contains the error message.
trans-unit.target: Strengverdien som inneholder feilmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Exception" name="System.Exception" href=""></xref> object that contains the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.Exception" name="System.Exception" href=""> </xref> objekt som inneholder det interne unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The integer value that contains status code.
trans-unit.target: Heltallsverdi som inneholder statuskoden.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"> </xref> klasse serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles under deserialisering til reconstitute unntak objektet overføres via en dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [XML og SOAP-serialisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som har datatypen serialiserte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTTP error status code returned after <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter HTTP feilstatuskode som ble returnert etter <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceClientException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the exception.
trans-unit.target: En heltallsverdi som representerer unntaket.
